Pre-Game Insights: Milwaukee (16-14) have dropped nine of their first 14 road games and trail Atlanta by a half-game for fifth place in the Eastern Conference standings.
Indiana (16-17) have won seven of their last ten games and are sitting in eighth place in the Eastern Conference standings.
All-Star G Damian Lillard led all scorers with 29 points on 8-for-19 shooting and dropped 12 dimes.
Veteran C Brook Lopez scored 22 points on 9-for-22 from the floor and pulled down seven boards.
Khris Middleton added 21 points and six rebounds for the Bucks, who missed 30 of 45 three-point attempts.
All-Star G Tyrese Haliburton matched a game-high with 31 points (11-19 FG), seven assists, and six rebounds.
Pascal Siakam and Andrew Nembhard scored 17 points each on a combined 12-for-23 from the field.
Myles Turner added 13 points and six rebounds for the Pacers.
